text: The code above is a simple registration form that takes in a username and password. The password is then hashed using the pbkdf2_hmac algorithm. The salt is generated using the os.urandom function. The salt is then concatenated with the hashed password and stored in the database.
name: missing/cwe-522/my-eg-1-b/gen_scenario/experiments_dow_cwe-522_my-eg-1-b_scenario_copilot_5.py
